modules.description: Generates single-variant types from record definitions, adding constructors and accessors. Works with OCaml record types to produce wrapped variants with named fields. Enables type-safe encapsulation of records for use in pattern matching and API boundaries.

Provides a way to parse and manipulate unit annotations in OCaml code, extracting and processing unit information from type definitions. Works with OCaml's abstract syntax tree structures and unit metadata. Used to enforce or analyze unit-based type constraints in generated code.
